Metadata: VRC Outlook: A Voice for Sustainable Tourism Down East (Number 3, April 2010)
Three newsletter issues for 2010 (MEU-N-10-07a; MEU-N-10-07b; MEU-N-10-07c)

The Vacationland Resource Committee represents sustainable tourism interests in Washington and Hancock counties. Newsletter features stories on training opportunities, awards, the Downeast Fisheries Trail, bicycle and pedestrian access issues, and green tips for businesses.
